about_the_game:
LocoPets is a “team-builder” roguelike. It takes the best elements of deck builders and auto-battlers, and fuses them into something totally fresh. Build your team, discover ridiculous synergies, and make the numbers go up. Each run offers endless possibilities.

Embrace the Chaos

Unleash the power of LocoPets! Combine Pets and Charms to discover awesome and surprising interactions. Utilize foods, potions, and scrolls to power up your LocoPets with a slew of special traits and enhancements. Each run is a new opportunity to experiment and strategize, and discover insane combos and wild synergies.

  • 60 unique Charms, each with game-changing effects
  • 18 unique LocoPets, each with their own special abilities
  • 25 foods, potions, and scrolls to enhance, upgrade, and alter your Pets
  • 20 tokens to permanently upgrade your run
  • 8 elemental types with special Charm interactions to build teams around
  • Special traits and brands to provide Pets with more unique powers
  • Level up LocoPets to increase their strength and the power of their abilities
  • Level up affinities to buff Pets of the same type and/or size
  • Visit the mysterious Wizard to buy special items for a special cost
